alert.note: Alert for Fannin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 5:52PM CDT until September 24 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 552 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bonham State Park, or 9 miles southeast of Bonham, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Honey Grove, Dodd City, Bonham State Park, Ladonia, Bailey, Pecan Gap, Windom, Dial, Bug Tussle, Gober, and Cotton Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
